tool_description: The kimonolabs World Cup 2014 API provides easy access to up-to-date player, team and match data for the 2014 World Cup as well as historical player performance across their respective club teams. The API is RESTful and uses standard HTTP response codes to indicate errors. JSON will be returned in all responses from the API.
name: The unOfficial World Cup 2014
title: The unOfficial World Cup 2014

api_list.name: Retrieve a Match
api_list.description: Returns a JSON object for the team that matches the specified id.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Display only certain fields, comma separated

api_list.name: Retrieve a Player Season Stat
api_list.description: Returns a JSON object for the PlayerSeasonStat that matches the specified id.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Display only certain fields, comma separated

api_list.name: List all Player Season Stats
api_list.description: Returns a JSON array containing PlayerSeasonStat objects matching the arguments provided.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Display only certain fields, comma separated

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort by any field ascending, or descending (1=ascending, -1=descending)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of objects returned (default: 50)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Starting index of first returned object (offset=0)
